localize.text: A Strange Tome

You enter a rundown antique shop looking for loot. As you explore you find a very fancy book on top of a rotten wooden table, its pages oozing out [mirror]sparkling dust[/color]. A little plaque on the side of the table reads: "Writeth a humble dreameth, taketh t on a crochet"
Write a silly dream ([green]Gain two Combat Pages of this chapter[/color])
Write a serious dream ([green]Gain a Combat Page of next chapter[/color])
You wrote about a silly dream you have, the book closing soon after. After heading towards the exit you see that some weapons lay by the entrance.
Walk away
You wrote about a silly dream you have, the book closing soon after. After heading towards the exit you see that a weapon lays by the entrance.
Walk away
Yun's Recollection

You find yourself in a commercial district, facing a cheap backstreets booth, receiving a call from an unknown number. "Hey, [mirror]Shard[/color]!" Yun's voice rings through the phone. Confusion rises as you're unsure of why he'd ever call you, considering how the last exchange went. "I got a new lead on something big... Though I'm a bit short on cash. Can you lend me some?" His monotone speech fills you with anemoia. There is a growing uncomfortable silence between the two of you, eventually broken by Yun. "No, seriously, I have a good feeling about this. Might be the last contract I have to do for a while..." There is a hint of desperation in his voice that breaks the cold and serious persona for a moment.
Wire him money -- he needs it more than you (Uses 5 Ahn)
Hang up the phone -- you've had enough of his antics.

The phone suddenly goes silent as the payment is sent, your attempts to communicate with Yun go unanswered. Heavy, loud and rushed footsteps are heard as you decide to leave. Someone grabs your arm...
Fight!
You hung up the phone and walked away. A group of disappointed fixers passes through, paying you no mind.
Your life goes on.
Finding a Lost Cat

A senile woman dressed in a pink homemade sweater asks you to find her cat Kibbles. It's a simple request, but who knows where Kibbles went. You have a gnawing feeling that it is paramount you find him before the evening comes.
Accept and look for Kibbles
Refuse politely
You refused the request, much to the woman's distress. She wanders off into the streets looking for Kibbles.
Walk away
You give up on the request and pay a fine enforced by a local syndicate.
Walk away ([red]Pay 5[/color] [yellow]Ahn[/color])

Search (25% Chance of Success)

Search (30% Chance of Success)

Current Time - ??:?? Kibbles is nowhere to be seen and instead you've been lead to a dead end. Sewege gates and lids open in unison behind you followed by distorted, nearly inhuman gargled cries. A shadowy figure with glowing red eyes and weapons rush towards you. There is no way out.
Prepare for a terrible encounter.
You've found Kibbles! He purrs softly as you hand him to the senile woman, now carrying a smile while walking back home.
A local syndicate member pays you handsomely, praising you for the good work. (+15 [yellow]Ahn[/color])
A Half-Finished Corpse

A corpse of a middle-aged man in a fine suit lays still in front of you, his intestines exposed. Judging from the scattered low quality surgical tools and footprints you can tell some Rats have been here, though for some reason they abandoned their harvest mid-way. You could search the man's pockets or, if you have the skills, finish the harvest.
Search the man's pockets ([green]Gain 1~10[/color] [yellow]Ahn[/color])
Finish the harvest yourself (Consume x1 [red]Gut-Harvesting[/color] Combat Page, [green]gain 5~20[/color] [yellow]Ahn[/color])
You rummage through the bloodstained pockets, finding some grease covered change.
Walk away (+{0} [yellow]Ahn[/color])
After an hour of gruesome work you collect what seem like valuable intestines and sell them to a local syndicate.
Walk away ([red]Lose x1 Gut-Harvesting[/color] Combat Page. +{0} [yellow]Ahn[/color])
Office Raid
You're down on your luck but seen an opportunity make a quick buck: Raiding a local office that's been weakened after fighting finishing a tough request, its members looking hurt and desperate.
Raid them!
Walk away -- its not worth your honor
